## Inspecting XML nodes

```{r}
rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block') %>%
    html_structure()
```


Explore node 1:
```{r}
rv_doc %>%
  html_elements(".body-block") %>%
  xml2::xml_child(1)
```
Explore node 2:
```{r}
rv_doc %>%
  html_elements(".body-block") %>%
  xml2::xml_child(2)
```

```{r}
  rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block') %>%
    xml_contents()

rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block p')

rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block') %>%
    html_children()
```

Get specific paragraph by id:
```{r}
rv_doc %>%
  html_elements('#p5')
```


Get multiple things at the same time (headers and paragraphs):
```{r}
rv_doc %>%
  html_elements('.body-block h2, .body-block p')
```


# Scratch code
```{r}

header_ids <- rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block h2') %>% html_attr('id')
  
  p_ids <- rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block p')
    html_element("#p1")
  
  xm_contents <- rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block') %>%
    xml_contents()
  
  rv_doc %>%
    html_elements('.body-block') %>%
    # html_children() %>%
    xml_child(1) %>%
    xml_contents() %>%
    html_elements('p')

  xm_contents %>%
    xml_child(1) %>%
    html_text()
```
